topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
DescribeCluster.description: Grants permission to describe a cluster.

topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

GetCompatibleKafkaVersions.name: GetCompatibleKafkaVersions
topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
GetCompatibleKafkaVersions.description: Returns a list of the Apache Kafka versions to which you can update this cluster.

topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
ListClusterOperations.description:
Returns a list of all the operations that have been performed on the specified MSK
                                                cluster.

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
ListClusters.description: Grants permission to return a list of all clusters in the current account.

ListConfigurations.name: ListConfigurations
topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
ListConfigurations.description: Grants permission to return a list of all configurations in the current account.

ListNodes.name: ListNodes
topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
ListNodes.description: Grants permission to return a list of nodes in a cluster.

ListScramSecrets.name: ListScramSecrets
topics: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

                                                MSK cluster.

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags of a MSK resource.
